DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Agent Pediatric Drug Formulation Process Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether the pharmaceutical form of the agent is intended for pediatric usage. EXAMPLE(S): A value of true may indicate that the agent is dissolvable, smaller, or grape flavored to be easily ingested by the pediatric population.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Protocol Agent Pediatric Drug Formulation Process Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A therapeutic agent (drug, intervention therapy) used in a clinical trial protocol._Having to do with children.:The act or process of developing or preparing a mixture of ingredients to create a desired end drug product, such as a specific flavor, aroma, or polymer; or the desired final drug product itself; also, a listing of the ingredients and composition of the dosage form.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A therapeutic agent (drug, intervention therapy) used in a clinical trial protocol.

Concepts.definition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having to do with children.:The act or process of developing or preparing a mixture of ingredients to create a desired end drug product, such as a specific flavor, aroma, or polymer; or the desired final drug product itself; also, a listing of the ingredients and composition of the dosage form.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: The act or process of developing or preparing a mixture of ingredients to create a desired end drug product, such as a specific flavor, aroma, or polymer; or the desired final drug product itself; also, a listing of the ingredients and composition of the dosage form.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader
Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
